title: Matrix Transpose
description: Write a Python function that returns the transpose of a given 2D matrix.
constraints: Constraints: The input matrix will be rectangular.
test:
def passTest():
	solution = Solution()
	param = [[[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], [7, 8, 9]], [[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6]], [[1, 2, 3]], [[1], [2], [3]], []]
	ans = [[[1, 4, 7], [2, 5, 8], [3, 6, 9]], [[1, 4], [2, 5], [3, 6]], [[1], [2], [3]], [[1, 2, 3]], []]
	for i in range(5):
		if ans[i] == solution.transposeMatrix(param[i]):
			continue
		else
			return False
	return True
passedTest = 'Passed all test cases' if passTest() else 'Test cases failed'
print(passedTest)
